alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:24PM MST until January 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches below 3000 feet and 5 to 8 inches above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, Winchester, and Kamiah. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
